statements: SELECT * FROM transaction_logs WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT log_id, user_id FROM transaction_logs WHERE operation = 'insert';
SELECT log_id, operation, details FROM transaction_logs WHERE user_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM transaction_logs WHERE log_id IN (1,3,5);
SELECT timestamp, user_id FROM transaction_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_logs LIMIT 5;
SELECT log_id, operation FROM transaction_logs WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, operation, details FROM transaction_logs WHERE operation LIKE 'UPDATE%' ORDER BY log_id ASC;
SELECT log_id, operation, details FROM transaction_logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' ORDER BY log_id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT log_id, user_id, operation, details FROM transaction_logs WHERE operation IN ('INSERT', 'DELETE') ORDER BY user_id, timestamp;
SELECT * FROM transaction_logs;
SELECT id, user_id, amount FROM transaction_logs WHERE transaction_type = 'deposit';
SELECT id, user_id, amount FROM transaction_logs WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM audit_trails ORDER BY event_type DESC;
SELECT id, event_type, event_description FROM audit_trails WHERE timestamp >= '2021-10-01';
SELECT * FROM transaction_logs WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, amount FROM transaction_logs WHERE transaction_type = 'deposit' ORDER BY amount DESC, timestamp ASC;
SELECT id, user_id, amount FROM transaction_logs WHERE transaction_type = 'withdrawal' AND timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY user_id, timestamp;
SELECT t.id, t.amount, a.event_type FROM transaction_logs t JOIN audit_trails a ON t.id = a.log_id WHERE a.event_type LIKE '%error%' ORDER BY t.amount DESC, a.timestamp ASC;

SELECT t.id, t.user_id, t.transaction_type, a.event_description FROM transaction_logs t LEFT JOIN audit_trails a ON t.id = a.log_id WHERE t.amount > 1000 OR a.id IS NULL ORDER BY t.user_id ASC, t.timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM TransactionLog WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, quantity FROM TransactionLog WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT transaction_id, user_id FROM TransactionLog WHERE quantity >= 5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM AuditTrail WHERE action = 'login' AND user_id = 3;
SELECT operation_id, status FROM EcommerceOperation ORDER BY operation_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM TransactionLog WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity) FROM TransactionLog GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT user_id, MAX(timestamp) FROM AuditTrail WHERE action = 'Login' GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT t.timestamp, a.action FROM TransactionLog t JOIN AuditTrail a ON t.user_id = a.user_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM TransactionLog;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, total_amount FROM transactions WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT product_id, quantity, price FROM order_details WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT action_description, time_stamp, user_id FROM audit_logs WHERE time_stamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY time_stamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, total_amount FROM transactions WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(customer_id) AS total_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(customer_id) > 5 ORDER BY total_transactions DESC;

SELECT orders.order_id, product_id, price, quantity FROM order_details INNER JOIN orders ON order_details.order_id = orders.order_id WHERE orders.order_id IN (SELECT order_id FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 500) ORDER BY price ASC, quantity DESC;
SELECT user_id, time_stamp, action_description, username FROM audit_logs INNER JOIN users ON audit_logs.user_id = users.user_id WHERE username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY time_stamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, amount FROM transaction_logs WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase' AND amount > 100 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT id, action, timestamp FROM audit_trails WHERE action LIKE '%login%' ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, username, email FROM users WHERE role = 'admin' ORDER BY username;
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_ordered FROM orders GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_ordered > 10 ORDER BY total_ordered DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT id, username, email FROM users WHERE role = 'customer' ORDER BY registered_at DESC;
SELECT products.name, products.price, orders.quantity FROM products JOIN orders ON products.id = orders.product_id WHERE orders.quantity >= 5;

SELECT users.username, transaction_logs.amount, transaction_logs.transaction_type FROM users INNER JOIN transaction_logs ON users.id = transaction_logs.user_id WHERE transaction_logs.amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_logs.timestamp DESC;
SELECT audit_trails.action, audit_trails.user_id, users.username, audit_trails.timestamp, audit_trails.details FROM audit_trails LEFT JOIN users ON audit_trails.user_id = users.id;
